list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: prejudice in favor of or against one thing, person, or group compared with another, usually in a way considered to be unfair.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was evidence of bias against foreign applicants
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có bằng chứng về sự thiên vị đối với người nộp đơn nước ngoài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in some sports, such as lawn bowling, the irregular shape given to a ball.
a steady voltage, magnetic field, or other factor applied to an electronic system or device to cause it to operate over a predetermined range.
cause to feel or show inclination or prejudice for or against someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: all too often, our recruitment processes are biased toward younger candidates
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tất cả quá thường xuyên, các quy trình tuyển dụng của chúng tôi được thiên vị đối với các ứng cử viên trẻ
